title: ANTIDIABET
description: A course on diabetic yoga methods to eliminate complications and symptoms: prevention of incipient hypoglycemia when driving a car, physical activity and sleep; cardiovascular risk management; prevention of microvascular complications of the legs; prevention of prediabetes «LIFESTYLE MODIFICATIONS» ; impeccable intention of timely glucose control and treatment independently, by caregivers of children and the elderly. Duration of the course is 12 weeks.
